overview: Set on the eve of their ten-year anniversary a Husband and Wife struggle to keep love and passion alive while their marriage rest on the fence between romance and toxicity. Married and Loving It is told in five separate, explosive chapters that tip toe the line between the obscene and the funny, between dramatic and offensive, and with an explosive finale never before seen in cinematic history.
tagline: Marriage is war and war is hell.
title: Married and Loving It!
